courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: Course ID: NSU-CS101. An overview of computing concepts, programming fundamentals using Python, and problem-solving strategies. Students will be able to write basic programs and explain core computer architecture.
learning_outcomes: Students will design algorithms for simple problems
Students will implement programs using control structures

courses.title: Data Structures
courses.description: Explores linear and non-linear data structures, complexity analysis, and memory management. Prerequisites: NSU-CS101. Outcomes: design efficient data representations.
learning_outcomes: Implement linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees
Analyse algorithmic complexity for data operations

courses.title: Database Systems
courses.description: Covers relational databases, SQL, transactions, and normalization. Students will be able to model data requirements and implement secure database solutions.
learning_outcomes: Design relational schemas and apply normalization
Develop SQL queries for CRUD operations

courses.title: Introduction to Data Science
courses.description: Introduces data wrangling, exploratory analysis, and statistical inference using Python and pandas. Students will be able to build basic predictive models.
learning_outcomes: Clean and visualise datasets using pandas
Apply regression for simple predictive tasks

courses.title: Calculus I
courses.description: Differential calculus covering limits, derivatives, and applications to optimisation.
learning_outcomes: Evaluate limits and derivatives
Apply differentiation to optimisation problems

courses.title: Linear Algebra
courses.description: Vectors, matrices, linear transformations, eigenvalues, and applications to data analysis.
learning_outcomes: Solve linear systems using matrix methods
Interpret eigenvalues in applied contexts

courses.title: Applied Statistics
courses.description: Covers probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, and ANOVA with statistical software.
learning_outcomes: Conduct hypothesis tests and interpret p-values
Design experiments and analyse variance

courses.title: Academic Writing
courses.description: Focuses on research-driven essays, citation methods, and persuasive communication skills.
learning_outcomes: Compose structured academic essays
Integrate sources using correct citation formats

courses.title: Principles of Management
courses.description: Examines planning, organising, leading, and controlling within organisations, including ethical decision-making.
learning_outcomes: Describe core management functions
Apply ethical frameworks to managerial decisions

courses.title: Technical Communication
courses.description: Prepares students to produce technical reports, data visualisations, and user documentation.
learning_outcomes: Create concise technical reports
Develop audience-appropriate documentation

courses.title: Programming Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduces structured programming using Java, problem decomposition, and debugging. Students will build small console applications.
learning_outcomes: Write programs using variables and control flow
Debug simple programming errors

courses.title: Object-Oriented Programming
courses.description: Covers classes, inheritance, interfaces, and testing patterns. Prerequisites: WTC-CS115.
learning_outcomes: Design class hierarchies for reusable software
Implement unit tests for object-oriented code

courses.title: Advanced Data Structures
courses.description: Explores graphs, heaps, hash tables, and algorithm analysis with emphasis on performance tuning.
learning_outcomes: Implement graph search algorithms
Optimise data structures for specific workloads

courses.title: Cloud Infrastructure
courses.description: Study of cloud platforms, container orchestration, and infrastructure automation. Students deploy scalable services.
learning_outcomes: Configure container-based deployments
Evaluate cloud architectures for reliability

courses.title: Applied Calculus
courses.description: Covers single-variable calculus with emphasis on engineering applications and modelling.
learning_outcomes: Differentiate and integrate common functions
Model real-world systems using calculus

courses.title: Discrete Mathematics
courses.description: Logic, combinatorics, graph theory, and discrete probability with applications to computing.
learning_outcomes: Apply propositional logic to circuit design
Use combinatorics to solve counting problems

courses.title: Statistics for Engineers
courses.description: Probability, estimation, regression, and design of experiments with statistical software.
learning_outcomes: Construct confidence intervals for engineering data
Develop regression models and assess fit

courses.title: Project Management
courses.description: Introduces project life cycles, scheduling, risk management, and stakeholder communication using industry tools.
learning_outcomes: Create project schedules with critical path methods
Mitigate project risks using standard frameworks

courses.title: Professional Communication
courses.description: Covers technical reports, presentations, and collaborative writing for technical teams.
learning_outcomes: Deliver persuasive technical presentations
Collaborate on documentation using revision control

courses.title: User Experience Design
courses.description: Focuses on user research, prototyping, usability testing, and inclusive design principles.
learning_outcomes: Conduct usability tests and interpret findings
Design prototypes that address user needs

courses.title: Foundations of Programming
courses.description: An intensive introduction to programming concepts using Python with emphasis on problem solving and collaboration.
learning_outcomes: Develop programs using functions and data structures
Apply debugging strategies in collaborative projects

courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: Covers software development life cycle, agile methodologies, version control, and quality assurance.
learning_outcomes: Plan iterative software projects
Implement testing strategies for reliability

courses.title: Machine Learning
courses.description: Supervised and unsupervised learning, model evaluation, and deployment considerations using Python and scikit-learn.
learning_outcomes: Train classification and regression models
Evaluate model performance using cross-validation

courses.title: Multivariable Calculus
courses.description: Extends calculus to multiple dimensions, covering gradients, divergence, and optimisation.
learning_outcomes: Compute gradients and directional derivatives
Optimise multivariate functions with constraints

courses.title: Precalculus
courses.description: Functions, trigonometry, and analytic geometry preparing students for calculus.
learning_outcomes: Analyse polynomial and trigonometric functions
Solve systems using algebraic techniques

courses.title: Data Analytics
courses.description: Explores statistical analysis, data visualisation, and storytelling using modern BI tools.
learning_outcomes: Create interactive dashboards for stakeholders
Translate analytic results into business insights

courses.title: Entrepreneurship
courses.description: Opportunity recognition, business model development, and startup financing fundamentals.
learning_outcomes: Develop business model canvases
Prepare financial projections for ventures

courses.title: Business Communication
courses.description: Emphasises professional writing, presentations, and digital communication strategies.
learning_outcomes: Craft persuasive business proposals
Deliver executive-level presentations

courses.title: Interaction Design
courses.description: User research methods, prototyping, accessibility, and evaluation metrics for interactive systems.
learning_outcomes: Develop prototypes that meet accessibility standards
Apply research insights to design iterations

courses.title: Cybersecurity Principles
courses.description: Network security, threat assessment, cryptography basics, and incident response planning.
learning_outcomes: Evaluate network vulnerabilities
Design incident response playbooks

courses.title: Global Ethics
courses.description: Examines ethical theories, cultural perspectives, and real-world case studies on global challenges.
learning_outcomes: Compare major ethical frameworks
Apply ethical reasoning to contemporary issues
